Trade/Device Name(s): RapidFRET Oral Fluid Assay for MDMA
RapidFRET Oral Fluid MDMA Calibrator Set
RapidFRET Oral Fluid MDMA Control Set
Specimen Container(s): Glass sample tube with inert screw cap
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for RapidFRET Oral Fluid Assay for MDMA, a time-resolved fluorescence immunoassay for qualitative screening of MDMA in oral fluid
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative screening for MDMA at 50 ng/mL in neat oral fluid collected with RapidEASE Oral Fluid Collector in central laboratories using the RapidFRET Integrated Workstation; preliminary result requiring confirmatory testing by GC/MS or LC/MS/MS
